fullplot: Citizen (Ajith), has many identities, as Anthony, Abdullah and Arivanandham. He has kidnapped three senior government officials and left clues as to why, which is tracked by the police. A conspiracy is uncovered and it is discovered that many years before an entire village had been wiped off the map of India...
